HomePage.heroTitle: The Freshest Milk, from Our Farm to Your Family
HomePage.heroSubtitle: Experience the pure, natural taste of tradition in every drop.
HomePage.feature1Text: Our cows graze freely on lush, green pastures, ensuring the highest quality milk.
HomePage.feature2Text: We are committed to sustainable farming practices that protect our environment.
HomePage.feature3Text: A tradition of quality passed down through generations since 1958.

AboutSection.title: A Tradition of Natural Quality
AboutSection.text: For over 60 years, our family-owned factory has been dedicated to producing the highest quality dairy products. We combine time-honored traditions with modern technology to bring the pure taste of nature from our local farms directly to your table. Our commitment is to freshness, taste, and the well-being of our community.

Footer.address: Prolettarskaya str. 114, Mozyr, Gomel region, Belarus
